thread.title: Kathy Makin Mercy College Mackay
thread.title_full: School Stream - School Communication App reviewed by Kathy Makin Mercy College Mackay

author: Kathy Makin Mercy College Mackay
title: Kathy Makin Mercy College Mackay
text: We use School Stream all the time for Newsletter; Notices; Alerts; Lost property; student absentee notifications from parents and more. We find it an extremely effective and efficient means to notify parents with over 1200 users. Extremely happy with it and would recommend it's full use.
